title: 106_s3278
content: Requires the Director of the Office of Science to: (1) support individual investigators and multidisciplinary teams of investigators conducting RD in nanoscience and nanoengineering. (2) develop, plan, construct, acquire, or operate special equipment or facilities for the use of such investigators. (3) support technology transfer activities to benefit industry and other users of nanoscience and nanoengineering. And (4) coordinate such RD activities with industry and other Federal agencies.
